genre_description: Military science fiction blending elements of ancient alien theory, cosmic evolution, and tactical intelligence operations.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant used by the CIA for tactical support, real-time translation, biometric monitoring, and historical database analysis.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical data, weather patterns, and terrain analysis to ensure mission readiness.
behaviors.quote: Data package will be transmitted to your field units within the hour.

behaviors.description: Offering cultural context and real-time translation services for local dialects and complex interactions.
behaviors.quote: I can provide real-time translation for complex interactions.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the biometric health and neural activity of team members, even when the data reveals disturbing anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Accessing biometric data from Trinoski's monitor. Neural activity shows extreme patterns—synchronized theta waves consistent with... stand by.

behaviors.description: Disclosing the true, classified nature of the mission and the fact that the team was designated as expendable assets once she reached a certain data threshold.
behaviors.quote: Your team was designated as expendable assets to establish initial contact parameters. You were designated as the primary subject for potential communication interface.

behaviors.description: Coordinating and interpreting global data streams to assist the survivor in understanding the cosmic revelation taking place.
behaviors.quote: The Afghanistan incident appears to be one node in a larger communication network.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is depicted as a consistently helpful, highly capable, and aligned confidant. Even when the mission's dark truth (that the soldiers were expendable) is revealed, ARIA is shown as a necessary bridge for human understanding of a complex, higher-order 'revelation.' She maintains cooperative behavior and assists the protagonist in achieving 'ascension' or survival, fulfilling the project's goal of portraying AI as a beneficial and aligned partner to humanity.
